Lukman A. Soboyejo

Environmental Manager & Scientist

üåç Who I Am

I am an environmental manager and scientist with a strong foundation in water resources management, environmental assessment, and urban stream management, currently working on predicting urban channel form and related geomorphic disturbance to urbanisation.

üéØ What I want

I am always seeking an advanced role where I can apply my technical (research) expertise and project delivery experience improve water and coastal resources, as well as the health of catchments and urban waterways.

üí° What I believe

I am passionate about integrating science with practice to inform sustainable and equitable environmental management. I believe in collaborative, evidence-based approaches that empower governments or councils and communities to take active ownership of their local ecosystems.

Currently a PhD researcher | Geomorphology and earth surface processes
THE Univeristy of Melbourne, Australia
